original: Larsson, Erik Vilhelm Fredrik, redaktör, Norrköping, f. 6/7/10 i Eskilstuna. G. 40 m. Ingeborg Brorsdotter Eri|ksson. — Studiex. i Eskilstuna 31, stud. i eng. v. Sthlms högsk. Medarb. i Södermani. Läns Tidn. 34, i Katrine-holms-Kuriren 38, red:sekr. där, medarb. i Norrköp. Tidningar sed. 47. Led. av styr. f. Publ :kl. östra krets. medl. av Sv. journrfören. Llobbies: målning, språk.
translated: Larsson, Erik Vilhelm Fredrik, editor, Norrköping, born on July 6th, 1910 in Eskilstuna. Married in 1940 to Ingeborg Brorsdotter Eriksson. - Completed studies in Eskilstuna in 1931, studied English at Stockholm University. Collaborated with Södermani Läns Tidning in 1934, joined Katrineholms-Kuriren in 1938 as editor-secretary, and contributed to Norrköpings Tidningar since 1947. Serves on the board of Publikationernas Klubb's eastern branch and is a member of the Swedish Journalists' Association. Hobbies: painting, languages.
